talk.author: did:plc:cc6itrtsc55sdku25g2kw4kv
talk.utter:
You're being polemically malicious.

I never claimed a President "can't do anything".

What I wrote is that foreign aid is collective effort of American politics.

What Biden is proposing is something that is not common and measured.

Non-combatants in Gaza are victims of war.

talk.author: did:plc:le3skjxqmzqs7da767flfi66
talk.utter: So can we accept the fact that some people are stupid enough to thrust Trump on the Gaza issues because Biden showed up to be a genocide unabler and completely outplayed by Netanyahu? I just refused the blaming of desperate people who sees the Biden administration unwavering support to Netanyahu.

talk.author: did:plc:cc6itrtsc55sdku25g2kw4kv
talk.utter:
You're blinded by your agenda.

A US President has bigger issues to worry about, such as Iran starting a war in the region.

E.g., Truman nuking Japan. Makes him guilty, but ended WWII.

And being a purity-pony in American politics will doom any good that can be done.  Everything is a compromise.
